programme.title: The Humanity Bureau
programme.desc: In the near future our government will decide who is expendable.

programme.title: Noble Things
programme.desc: Jimmy Wayne Collins finds himself adrift in Memphis, Tennessee. Forced to return home to the piney woods of Southeast Texas, Jimmy will face his imprisoned brother, his dying father and the demons he left behind.

programme.title: The Last Day of August
programme.desc: Dan (Michael Izquierdo) was paralyzed just over a year ago. Following months of recovery and overwhelmed by lifes new realities, he retreated to a family cabin in upstate New York. On the last day of August, his closest friends arrive unannounced to confront him about his recent reclusive and self-destructive behavior. Wanting to support him, yet skeptical of his psychological health, they attempt the tight-rope walk of loving confrontation in the hopes of convincing Dan to return home. Friendships are tested and love reveals itself in this independent drama about breaking down and breaking through. "The Last Day of August" is about the enduring power of love and friendship, and the struggle to overcome the mental and physical barriers that confront those living with addiction and disability. How we react to tragedy defines us, and when loved ones grapple with immense personal suffering, its not always apparent how to respond and whether the help we have to give is the help thats truly needed. This film is a personal examination of how destructive behaviors such as substance abuse and self-isolation emerge from trauma, and how one finds the strength to overcome.

programme.title: My Son, My Son, What Have Ye Done
programme.desc: Inspired by a true crime, a man begins to experience mystifying events that lead him to slay his mother with a sword.

programme.title: Guido Superstar: The Rise of Guido
programme.desc: An Italian immigrant is thrust into the world of drug-lords, supercars and secret agents in this hilarious action comedy. After losing his job at the Disco Valet Company for undue heroism, Guido (Silvio Pollio) must pose as a Sicilian gangster for the FBI in order to infiltrate a powerful Asian gang. Things go sour and take a turn for the worse. Guido must now make amends before he is discovered and killed, or worse, deported.

programme.title: Unknown Energies, Unidentified Emotions
programme.desc: A hybrid of animated, experimental, feature and genre film in found footage technique, with a radio phonic sound and of unexpected, almost 40-minute duration. Journalist Isidor Dukas visits the Institute for Research on Psychic Phenomena and Mental Film when a confrontation with one of the test subjects transforms a routine check into a never-ending maze. Barićs work calls into question issues surrounding artistic practices in the digital age including ideas about authenticity, simulation/replication and appropriation.

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: Two rebellious teens, on the run from a desert survival camp, steal the car of two naive Mormon missionaries. They end up in New Harmony, the town thats been anxiously awaiting their Mormon missionaries.

programme.title: Score: A Hockey Musical
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Farley has led a sheltered life, raised on a diet of home schooling, organic living and trips to the art gallery. To his parents dismay, Farley loves to play hockey with the local kids. To their even greater dismay, Farley is scouted and signed by the owner of a junior league team, where he becomes an instant star. But Farley discovers that stardom comes with a price - including the expectation to fight on the ice. Throw in a changing relationship with his best friend, and Farley finds himself losing his way.

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old York Hayes, leader of the Fire Dragon Scout Troops, returns to Camp Rahuta for his final scout camp. York has decided to take the best step of his life.

programme.title: Field of Lost Shoes
programme.desc: Based on a true story of the American Civil War, culminating at the Battle of New Market, May 1864. A group of teenage cadets sheltered from war at the Virginia Military Institute must confront the horrors of an adult world when they are called upon to defend the Shenandoah Valley. Leaving behind their youth, these cadets must decide what they are fighting for.

programme.title: Corner Office
programme.desc: As Orson, The Authoritys newest employee, finds himself trapped in the absurdities of corporate life, his alienation deepens when he discovers a room hes told doesnt exist.

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Break Up
programme.desc: Abigail, a self-sufficient single mom meets Ben. They both think every great relationship ends in disaster. On the first date they come up with 10 things to do together before they break up. But the estimated end is not so sure - because fate adds #11 to their list.

programme.title: Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: Land Of the Blind
programme.desc: A soldier recounts his relationship with a famous political prisoner attempting to overthrow their countrys authoritarian government.

programme.title: The Zodiac
programme.desc: THE ZODIAC takes a different look at the famous Zodiac Killer case from other screen treatments of the murders. More than a simple crime story, the film is an emotional thriller focusing on the murders impact on victims, their families and the wider community. The film follows a police detective and his son who become obsessed with the murders and endanger their family in the process.

programme.title: The Quest
programme.desc: Christopher Dubois embarks on an odyssey of self-discovery that spans the globe. Kidnapped and enslaved by gun smugglers, sold by pirates and thrust into the murky underworld of gambling and kickboxing, Chris journey takes him to forbidding Muay Thai Island where deadly martial arts are taught, the colonial splendor of British East Asia, the dank back alleys of Bangkok, desolate deserts once trodden by the warriors of Genghis Khan and finally, the ancient Lost City. There he must face the ultimate test of his manhood in the fabled Ghang-gheng, the ancient winner-take-all competition in which the deadliest fighters from around the world employ the most spectacular feats of martial arts skills ever displayed in order to win the prized Golden Dragon. But fighting prowess alone will not be enough for Chris to triumph over such daunting foes. He must reach deep inside and access all of the determination, strength of character, and sense of selfless honor within in order to triumph over ...

programme.title: Mayor Cupcake
programme.desc: A hard-working cupcake maker is inadvertently elected mayor of a small town burdened with debt. Uneducated, she relies on her street smarts to clean up the town.

programme.title: Summer Dreams
programme.desc: Seventeen-year old Robbie Zirpollo has a problem. As the film opens, his mother is driving him to his new summer job. We learn that Robbie has grown up in Oceanside, California, but now he and his mother have moved to Colorado for a fresh start, as his father has taken the familys savings and his secretary to Mexico. Robbies mom has, through an uncle, gotten him a summer job at Water World on the grounds crew. The adventure begins when Robbie meets Alex and gets moved to Aokees Surf and Snack shack to work. Alex convinces Robbie to enter the parks "Employee Olympics" to bring the Surfer King trophy to its rightful place among the concessions crew. Tiffany, the park owners daughter, has other ideas for Robbie.

programme.title: House of the Stone Monkeys
programme.desc: The action proceeds along two tracks and two time frames. We meet the boy, who lives with his mother in a Budapest apartment house, in the summer of 2012. Another boy is spending his vacation with his grandparents in the same building in the summer of 1982. The house unveils its mysterious secret to both of them.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: A railroad worker in China in 1941 leads a team of freedom fighters against the Japanese in order to get food for the poor.

programme.title: I Could Never Be Your Woman
programme.desc: A mother falls for a younger man while her daughter falls in love for the first time. Mother Nature messes with their fates.

programme.title: Almost Friends
programme.desc: Charlie, a culinary genius, has lost the motivation. He doesnt know what to with his life anymore, but he knows one thing - get close to Amber. In comparison to her boyfriend, he seems to be totally unattractive, but Charlies closest friend convinces him that where theres a will theres a way.

programme.title: Black Cop
programme.desc: Follow the contradictory and challenging story of an African Canadian cop. He has been attacked by his fellow officers and becomes the victim of racial profiling. The policeman is struggling between duty and moral obligation, and is pushed over the edge. He decides to take revenge on his community.

programme.title: Black Water
programme.desc: A deep cover operative awakens to find himself imprisoned in a CIA black site on a submarine.

programme.title: Crossing Point
programme.desc: The girlfriend of a couple vacationing in Baja is kidnapped by a drug dealer who demands that her boyfriend smuggle back cocaine into the US or she will be killed.

programme.desc: Kad Olīva samelo savai labākajai draudzenei par nevainības zaudēšanu ar vienu no koledžas puišiem, to nejauši dzird kāda cita meitene. Drīz vien šis stāsts izplatās pa visu skolu, gluži kā kūlas ugunsgrēks.

programme.title: Visa pasaules nauda
programme.desc: Kad sešpadsmitgadīgais Džons Pols Getijs III tiek nolaupīts, viņa izmisusī māte Geila lūdz jaunekļa vectēvu, naftas magnātu, samaksāt izpirkumu. Kad miljardieris Getijs atsakās, Geila visiem spēkiem mēģina viņu pārliecināt, jo dēla nolaupītāji kļūst arvien brutālāki. Kamēr zēna dzīvība karājas mata galā, negaidīti par Geilas sabiedroto šajā cīņā kļūst Getija konsultants Flečers Čeiss, bijušais CIP darbinieks.

programme.title: Mana Māsīca Reičela

programme.title: Džeina Ostina sabojāja manu dzīvi
programme.desc: Agate - burvīga un pretrunu pilna, nonāk izmisīgā vienatnē. Viņas sapnis ir piedzīvot mīlestību, kura līdzinās Džeinas Ostinas romānam un viņas galvenais mērķis ir kļūt par rakstnieci. Tā vietā, viņa pavada savas dienas pārdodot grāmatas leģendārā britu grāmatnīcā Parīzē.

programme.title: Pianists
programme.desc: Otrā pasaules kara laikā atzīts poļu mūziķis Vladislavs pazaudējis kontaktu ar savu ģimeni. Situācija kļūst aizvien sliktāka, un viņš izdzīvošanas nolūkos paslēpjas Varšavas drupās.

programme.title: Modiste
programme.desc: Tillija pēc 25 gadu prombūtnes ir atgriezusies mājās - vietā, kuru reiz viņai nācās pamest, jo cilvēki uzskatīja, ka viņa ir maza puisēna slepkava. Šo 25 gadu laikā Tillija ir kļuvusi par nepārspējami labu kleitu šuvēju, un nu viņa ir atpakaļ dzimtajā mājā, lai pierādītu savu nevainību.

programme.title: Pasaulēm tālu
programme.desc: Kamēr Dienvideiropu plosa sociālekonomiskās nemieri, mūsdienu Grieķijā risinās trīs atšķirīgi stāsti. Katrs no tiem atspoguļo atšķirīgu grieķu paaudzi, kas iemīlējusies ārzemniekā, un katrs stāsts galu galā saplūst kopā, veidojot vienotu veselumu.

programme.title: Last Bite Hotel
programme.desc: Tituss Burgess welcomes Alex Guarnaschelli, Cat Cora and Jose Garces to the hotel. The final competitors must impress the guests to win the prize.

programme.title: Christmas Cookie Challenge
programme.desc: Reality competition for the festive period. A group of talented bakers hope to impress the judges with their Christmas cookies as they face a series of themed challenges. The judges will be looking for inventiveness, decorating skills and, of course, deliciously baked Christmas cookies. Whoever can wow the judges and blow away the competition will take home a huge cash prize.

programme.title: House Of Knives
programme.desc: A new culinary powerhouse enters the arena, and the chefs create noodle dishes in the contender battle before two chefs battle over mushrooms.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.desc: Shift 8: Elevation. In the final hours of the competition, the chefs must cook the best dishes of their lives for a chance at 50,000 and an unforgettable trip to Hawaii.

programme.desc: A Tale Of Two Fridges. Food truck owner Omayra Dakis and chef Dominque Crisp turn leftovers into tacos and ramen. Then, they make dishes for Antonia Lofaso and Jake Smollett.

programme.title: Kids Sweets Showdown
programme.desc: Nearly all kids love to eat sweet treats, but how many can make them? In this cooking competition series hosted by Alisson Sweeney, Sharone Hakman and Harley Morenstein, young bakers are invited to showcase their culinary talents for a slice of a hefty $10,000 cash prize. Two pairs of kids go head to head in a primary baking competition, whilst there are also "sugar rush" challenges, where the young bakers have a limited amount of time to create something delicious. Each of the dishes are judged and scored, with the best performing duo taking home the cash.

programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods

The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: Shift 8: Elevation. In the final hours of the competition, the chefs must cook the best dishes of their lives for a chance at 50,000 and an unforgettable trip to Hawaii.

programme.title: Save the Leftovers
programme.desc: A Tale Of Two Fridges. Food truck owner Omayra Dakis and chef Dominque Crisp turn leftovers into tacos and ramen. Then, they make dishes for Antonia Lofaso and Jake Smollett.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Chopped

programme.title: Christmas Cookie Challenge
programme.desc: Reality competition for the festive period. A group of talented bakers hope to impress the judges with their Christmas cookies as they face a series of themed challenges. The judges will be looking for inventiveness, decorating skills and, of course, deliciously baked Christmas cookies. Whoever can wow the judges and blow away the competition will take home a huge cash prize.

programme.title: Kids Sweets Showdown
programme.desc: Nearly all kids love to eat sweet treats, but how many can make them? In this cooking competition series hosted by Alisson Sweeney, Sharone Hakman and Harley Morenstein, young bakers are invited to showcase their culinary talents for a slice of a hefty $10,000 cash prize. Two pairs of kids go head to head in a primary baking competition, whilst there are also "sugar rush" challenges, where the young bakers have a limited amount of time to create something delicious. Each of the dishes are judged and scored, with the best performing duo taking home the cash.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 2. Cooking show.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 3. Cooking show.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Outchefd
programme.desc: Fillet Frenzy. Its sink or swim for home cook Lydia Wexler as she takes on the renowned Chef Michael Voltaggio in an intense salmon showdown.

programme.title: Halloween Wars
programme.desc: Follow five teams that include candy makers, pumpkin carvers, and cake decorators, as they compete in making the best, most spooky and delicious Halloween themed display. The teams have various interesting challenges, one team gets eliminated each week, and the winners take home a great money prize.

programme.title: Ciao House
programme.desc: A Whiff Of Mutiny. The chefs travel to Otranto, Italy, to purchase fresh seafood from the docks. Then, the judges task them with their most difficult challenge yet.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Cake Boss

The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Rachel Khoos Simple Pleasures
programme.desc: Cooking doesnt have to be difficult, nor does it require extravagant ingredients that are hard to find. From her home kitchen in Sweden, Rachel Khoo shares her secrets to cooking, providing viewers with delectable recipes created from easy-to-source ingredients, and guaranteeing enjoyment when it comes to rustling up dinner. Though her recipes are laced with simplicity, they are packed with flavour and she encourages viewers to recreate these mouthwatering fares.

programme.title: Selena + Restaurant
programme.desc: At Wolfgang Pucks gorgeous CUT steakhouse, Selena Gomez takes on two initiation tests before creating her own spicy seafood dish.

programme.title: Selena + Restaurant
programme.desc: At Chef Marcel Vignerons Lemon Grove, Selena Gomez creates a colourful dish with unusual ingredients. Will Marcel make the dish his new special?

programme.title: News
programme.desc: Новости: a news report from Ukraine with details of the latest national and international stories.

programme.title: Zagļu medības 2: Pantera
programme.desc: Lielais Niks atkal ir medībās – šoreiz Eiropā, un viņš jau tuvojas Donijam, kurš ir iesaistījies bīstamajā dimantu zagļu pasaulē un bēdīgi slavenajā "Panteras" mafijā. Viņi plāno grandiozu laupīšanu pasaulē lielākajā dimantu biržā.

programme.title: Gambīts
programme.desc: Mākslas kuratoram Harijam Dīnam ik dienu nākas paciest sava līdz ausīm bagātā priekšnieka Laionela ekscentriskās izdarības. Nu viņš plāno atriebties, taču šim uzdevumam viņam ir vajadzīga karstasinīgas rodeo karalienes Pīdžejas palīdzība. Harijs liek senam draugam izgatavot pazudušas Monē gleznas kopiju un pamudina priekšnieku to "nejauši" ievērot. Ja darījums izdosies, Harijs un viņa līdzdalībnieki būs par dažiem miljoniem mārciņu bagātāki.

programme.title: Māceklis
programme.desc: Stāsts par meistaru un viņa mācekli Ņujorkas nekustamo īpašumu džungļos. 70. gadu sākumā Donalds Tramps ir iesācējs – kompleksu mākts lietu kārtotājs, kurš atrodas tētuka Trampa seniora pavēnī. Iepazīstoties ar advokātu Roju Konu, viņa dzīve mainās. Zogot no citiem idejas, spārnotus teicienus (arī no Reigana) un pārņemot Kona taktiku, Tramps kļūst par savu "labāko versiju". AIDS epidēmija, šovbiznesa ziedonis un itāļu marmora modernās pilis. Pilsēta, kas nekad neguļ, ir Trampa spēļu laukums – tiesa, tajā viņam pašam kļūst par šauru.

programme.title: Krauklis
programme.desc: Dvēseles radinieki Ēriks Dravens un Šellija Vēbstere tiek nežēlīgi nogalināti. Saņemot iespēju upurēt sevi un glābt savu mūža mīlestību, Ēriks dodas ceļā, šķērsojot dzīvo un mirušo pasauli, lai atriebtos un izcīnītu taisnību.

programme.title: Kapteinis Zobenzobs un burvju briljants
programme.desc: Ļaunais princis Megans Hans no džungļiem un Karību jūras pirāts kapteinis Zobenzobs jau sen dzen maģiskā briljanta pēdas. Tas nav parasts dārgakmens. Pusnaktī tas spēj piepildīt viskvēlāko vēlēšanos, lai kāda tā būtu. Visi meklējumi "kaķim zem astes", taču tad, klejodams pa džungļiem, burvju dārgakmeni nejauši ierauga mazais Marks.

programme.title: Alvins un burunduki
programme.desc: Komponists Deivs jau krietnu laiku cenšas gūt panākumus mūzikas nozarē. Lai gan viņa bijušais studiju biedrs ir ticis augstā amatā kādā ierakstu kompānijā, Deivam nekādi neizdodas sasniegt mērķi. Stāvoklis kļūst cerīgāks, kad Deivs iepazīstas ar trim dziedošiem burundukiem, kas slēpjas Ziemsvētku eglītē ierakstu kompānijas galvenajā ēkā.

programme.title: Marija
programme.desc: Marija Kallasa, pasaulē izcilākā operdziedātāja, pavada savas dzīves pēdējās dienas 1970. gadu Parīzē, saskaroties ar savu identitāti.

programme.title: Relikviju mednieki
programme.desc: Patiess stāsts par vērienīgākajām dārgumu medībām pasaules vēsturē. Pārsteidzoša Otrā pasaules kara karavīru komanda saņem pavēli izglābt nacistu nozagtos mākslas šedevrus un atgriezt tos īstajiem īpašniekiem. Uzdevums šķita neizpildāms, jo mākslas darbi atradās aiz ienaidnieka līnijas, un Vācijas armijai bija pavēlēts pēc Reiha krišanas iznīcināt absolūti visu. Vai tad muzeju direktori, kuratori un mākslas vēsturnieki, kuri labāk pārzināja Mikelandželo darbus, nevis ieročus, varēja cerēt uz izdošanos?

programme.title: Trakās ķepas. Leģenda par Henku
programme.desc: Henks varbūt ir necils suns, taču viņš ir apņēmības pilns kļūt par samuraju. Suņuks dodas uz valsti, kur čum un mudž no kaķiem. Tur Henks satiek nejauko kaķu karavadoni Iku Ču un arī Džimbo, kurš reiz bijis varens samurajs. Džimbo paņem Henku savā paspārnē un iemāca viņam, ko īsti nozīmē būt samurajam. Dzimstot pirmajai īstajai draudzībai starp kaķi un suni, abiem nākas glābt Kakamučo no ļaunā Ika Ču.

programme.title: Pie visa vainīga mīlestība
programme.desc: Žoslēns ir veiksmīgs biznesmenis, toties mīlas dzīvē – patmīlīgs brunču mednieks. Kad viņš mēģina jau atkal savaldzināt jaunu sievieti, izliekoties, ka ir ratiņkrēslā, viņa iepazīstina Žoslēnu ar savu māsu, kura patiešām piesaistīta dzīvei ratiņkrēslā.

programme.title: Es gribu dejot. Vitnijas Hjūstones stāsts
programme.desc: Līksms, emocionāls un sirdi plosošs ieskats Vitnijas Hjūstones, visu laiku labākās RandB stila popa dziedātājas, dzīvē un mūzikā, sākot no paša sākuma līdz mūzikas jomas slavas zālei.

programme.title: Džeisons Borns
programme.desc: Bijusī CIP slepenā aģente Nikija Pārsone (Džūlija Stailza) reiz palīdzēja Bornam (Mets Deimons), pēc tam nozuda un šobrīd strādā kopā ar ziņotāju, kurš gatavojas nodot atklātībā CIP slepenās specoperācijas. Nikija ielaužas CIP sistēmā un lejupielādē visu, kas saistīts ar specoperācijām, tostarp operāciju "Dzirnakmens", kurā piedalījās Borns. CIP aģente Hetera Lī (Alīsija Vikandere) atklāj ielaušanos un par to ziņo CIP direktoram Robertam Dūvijam (Tomijs Lī Džonss), kurš ir specoperāciju galvenais vadītājs.

programme.title: Nolīdzināt līdz ar zemi
programme.desc: Divi policisti tiek atbrīvoti no darba pēc tam, kad atklātībā nonāk video, kurā abi pārinieki pielieto spēku, lai saņemtu atzīšanos no aizdomās turamā. Nespēdami atrast citu nodarbošanos, viņi dodas peļņā kriminālajā sfērā, kur par viņu galveno ienaidnieku kļūst nesen no cietuma iznākušais un atriebību policijai alkstošs noziedznieks.

programme.title: Killera sievas miesassargs
programme.desc: Miesassargs Maikls Braiss beidzot var atviegloti uzelpot. Trakais killers Dariuss Kinkeids, kurš piebeidzis veselu baru ļaužu visā pasaulē, nu ir nozudis. Saule, mīļākā grāmata un ne domas par Kinkeidu – ko gan vēl varētu vēlēties, lai atgūtu formu. Taču tad pludmalē uzrodas līdz matu galiem apbruņotā Kinkeida sieva Sonja, un viņai ir sliktas ziņas – Kinkeids ir Itālijā, viņu nolaupījuši teroristi un tie ir jāiznīcina!

programme.title: Es, Tonija
programme.desc: Tonija ir izcila maita. Un par visu vairāk pasaulē viņa dievina sliktos puišus, stipras cigaretes un pati sevi. Un vēl viņa ir ASV čempione daiļslidošanā un gatavojas doties uz Olimpiskajām spēlēm. Ir tikai jātiek vaļā no konkurentes – un šajā sakarā Tonijai viss ir jau izplānots.

programme.title: Dinozauriņš Diplodoks
programme.desc: Titulētais dinozauriņš dodas piedzīvojumā, lai glābtu savus vecākus, kuri pazuduši mīklainos apstākļos. Ceļā viņš sastaps ne vien burvi un divus dīvainus zinātniekus, bet arī fantastiskas būtnes un nokļūs apbrīnojamās vietās.

programme.title: Pie visa vainīga mīlestība
programme.desc: Žoslēns ir veiksmīgs biznesmenis, toties mīlas dzīvē – patmīlīgs brunču mednieks. Kad viņš mēģina jau atkal savaldzināt jaunu sievieti, izliekoties, ka ir ratiņkrēslā, viņa iepazīstina Žoslēnu ar savu māsu, kura patiešām piesaistīta dzīvei ratiņkrēslā.

programme.title: Kā Grinčs nozaga Ziemassvētkus
programme.desc: Vūvila ir maza, brīnumaina pilsētiņa, kas atrodas sniegpārsliņā. Visiem Vūvivas iedzīvotājiem ļoti patīk Ziemassvētki. Taču pilsētiņas tuvumā mīt Grinčs — ļoti nejauks radījums, kuram riebjas gan Ziemassvētki, gan arī vūvilieši, jo tie savulaik viņu izstūmuši no sava vidus. Redzot, kā viņi priecājas un gaida svētkus, Grinčs nolemj nozagt visas Ziemassvētku dāvanas. Bet varbūt kādai mazai meitenītei izdosies sadraudzēties ar Grinču un likt viņam mainīt savus plānus?

programme.title: Kā pieradināt pūķi
programme.desc: Vikingu pusaudzis Hikaps dzīvo Berkas salā kopā ar savu valdonīgo tēvu. Kaujas ar pūķiem ir vikingu ikdiena un dzīves veids, taču Hikapu tās neaizrauj. Tā vietā viņš labprātāk nododas visvisādiem izgudrojumiem un apkārtnes iepazīšanai. Reiz kādā no saviem klejojumiem Hikaps sastop ievainotu pūķi, kuram palīdz atkal lidot. Šī sastapšanās maina abu dzīves. Un, kad pienāk iesvētību laiks – lielā iespēja kaujā ar pūķiem sevi pierādīt tēvam un visai ciltij –, Hikaps rīkojas pavisam neparasti.

programme.title: Maskētie spiegi
programme.desc: Superspiegs Lenss Sterlings ir labākais savā profesijā un, būdams dzīvesprieka pilns, viņš ar lielāko prieku katru dienu glābj pilsētas un valstis. Jaunais zinātnieks Volters, kurš apgādā Lensu ar modernām ierīcēm, ir pilnīgs pretstats - būdams vienmēr drūms, viņš cenšas būt nošķirts no visas pasaules un palikt vienatnē ar saviem izgudrojumiem. Taču pienāk brīdis, kad neparastajam pārītim būs jāatrod kopīga valoda, lai ar neticamu brīnumu palīdzību izglābtu pasauli.

programme.title: Troļļi
programme.desc: Troļļi ir mazi un laimīgi radījumi, kuri savā pasaulē nodarbojas ar dziedāšanu, apskaušanos un būšanu laimīgiem. Tomēr viņu idilli mežā pārtrauc bergeni, kuri atklāj viņu atrašanās vietu un kuri ir milzu monstri, kas ir nepārtraukti nelaimīgi. Monstri atklāj, ka viņi var kļūt laimīgi, ja apēd troļļus. Troļļi glābjas, un viņus caur slepeniem tuneļiem vada karalis Pepijs. Pēc divām desmitgadēm Pepija meita Popija organizē izsmalcinātas svinības par godu tam, ka viņi ir izglābušies. Vientulīgais izdzīvošanas speciālists Zars pret to iebilst, jo uztraucas, ka troksnis varētu piesaistīt bergenus. Viņam izrādās taisnība, un bergeni nolaupa daudzus troļļus. Popija dodas glābšanas misijā, un Zars dodas viņai līdzi, jo neuzskata, ka Popija būs drošībā. Viņi ierodas bergenu pilsētā, kur ierauga, kā bergenu karalis apēd vienu trolli. Tomēr Popijas domas ir tādas, ka šis trollis tomēr ir izdzīvojis. Viņi atklāj, kur troļļus tur gūstā un kas tos uzrauga. To uzraudzītāja ir virtuves darbiniece Bridžita, kuru ir apbūris karalis. Viņa piekrīt atbrīvot ieslodzītos un ļaut Popijai un Zaram piekļūt karalim, ja viņai būs iespēja ar karali aiziet uz randiņu. Gatavojoties randiņam, Popija un Zars sastrīdas, jo Zars atsakās dziedāt, apgalvojot, ka dziedāšana nogalināja viņa vecmāmiņu, un šis notikums padarīja viņu pelēku. Bridžita tiek sapucēta kā lēdija, un viņa kopā ar karali dodas braukt ar skrituļslidām un uz restorānu. Troļļi tomēr nespēj Bridžitu pārvērst lēdijā uz visiem laikiem, un Bridžita sāk raudāt. Viņi mēģina izglābt troļļus, taču glābšanas laikā arī Popija tiek ieslodzīta. Popijai zūd cerības, un visi troļļi paliek pelēki. Zars sāk dziedāt un atzīstas mīlestībā. Visiem par pārsteigumu, troļļiem atgriežas krāsas, arī Zaram. Troļļus taisās apēst, bet Bridžita viņus izglābj. Karalis un citi bergeni atklāj, ka viņiem troļļi nav jāapēd, lai kļūtu laimīgi. Troļļi un bergeni laimīgi sāk dzīvot saticīgi, un Popiju kronē par troļļu karalieni.

programme.title: Cīņa caur tumsu
programme.desc: Tumšākajā Misisipi nostūri pagrīdes cīkstonim ir jādodas savā pēdējā cīņā, lai nomaksātu parādus un glābtu savas mirstošās audžumātes māju.

programme.title: Ar ieročiem rokās
programme.desc: Mailzs, pieaudzis vīrietis, kura bērnības sapņi neīstenojās, vada savas dienas, izniekojot laiku pie datora un kaitinot tīmekļa troļļus ar dzēlīgiem komentāriem. Kādu dienu viņš uzzina par tīmekļa sensāciju "Skizm", kas iesaista cilvēkus spēlē uz dzīvību un nāvi. Mailzs sāk kaitināt spēles skatītājus un piesaista vietnes administratoru uzmanību. Viņi ielaužas Mailza mājā, nolaupa vīrieti un piespiež iesaistīties iznīcinošajā spēlē. Mailzam ir uzdevums – nogalināt Niksu, vienu no nežēlīgākajām "Skizm" spēlētājām. Sākas postoša, spraiga un stilīga spēle – kurš izdzīvos?

programme.title: Atzīstiet manu vainu
programme.desc: Kad policijai beidzot izdodas arestēt divdesmit Lukēzi mafijas klana locekļus, Džekijs Dinoršio, ar iesauku Resnais, kurš jau izcieš 30 gadu cietumsodu, saņem vilinošu piedāvājumu – Džekiju atbrīvos priekšlaicīgi, ja viņš liecinās pret saviem draugiem. Bet Resnais Di nav nodevējs! Tiesas procesā, kas izrādīsies garākais un skandalozākais ASV tiesu praksē, Džekijs sevi aizstāvēs pats.

programme.title: Pēdējais elpas vilciens
programme.desc: Patiess stāsts par dziļjūras nirējiem, kas cīnās, lai izglābtu savu komandas biedru, iesprostotu desmitiem metru zem okeāna virsmas.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Baskonia - Virtus
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: LaLiga. Atletico Madrid - Levante
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Futbols: Bundesliga. Werder - Wolfsburg
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: UFC. Gabriel Bonfim-Randy Brown
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Mediterranean Life
programme.desc: Few places share the magical sparkle of the Mediterranean coastline, with many dreaming of one day purchasing property in this idyllic region. This reality series follows potential homeowners from the US as they look to find their dream property on the Med. From the extravagant luxuries of the French Riviera to the slower pace of life on the island of Sicily, each destination is engulfed in picturesque beaches, turquoise waters and unparalleled culture.

programme.title: Bargain Block
programme.desc: Bargain Block follows home renovation experts and partners Keith Bynum and Evan Thomas on their journey to restore Detroits iconic American neighborhoods one house at a time. With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: Based in Kansas City, Tamara Day is a restoration expert who believes no home is too big for her to take on. Scouring the city for large, neglected mansions that she can buy on the cheap, she then uses her eye for design to transform these shabby houses into elegant homes. With her dad helping her on each project, they gut the decaying aspects of each house whilst keeping any characteristic and authentic features, enticing deep-pocketed buyers with open concepts and modern layouts. Using her experience from maintaining buildings on the family farm, she turns these decrepit structures into warm homes that are perfect for a family to move in and start creating memories.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Join host Tony Harris as he investigates the most mysterious content ever captured and attempts to unearth the truth. Employing the assistance of experts and state-of-the-art technology, Tony is determined to decipher whether these photos, videos and audio recordings of purported supernatural and paranormal events are falsified or for real. He meets with eyewitnesses, conducts tests and stops at nothing to determine the truth.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Join host Tony Harris as he investigates the most mysterious content ever captured and attempts to unearth the truth. programme.title: The Proof Is Out There

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: American Pickers is an American reality series that follows ingenious "pickers" Mike Wolfe, and his business partner, Frank Fritz, as they hunt down objects with historical, collectible and pop culture value. They travel around the United States to buy or "pick" various items for resale, for clients, or for their own personal collections. Danielle Colby is in charge of their office of Antique Archaeology.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Did a filmmaker capture footage of a wooly mammoth crossing a river in Siberia? Is a recording of a long moaning howl proof that Bigfoot lives in Ohio? Is Sophia the talking robot really out to destroy humanity?

programme.title: Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: The Academy Award-winning actor explores the stories of some of the most famous jailbreaks in history, from notorious places like Alcatraz, Dannemora and Pittsburgh State Penitentiary. Freeman, who once played the character of prisoner Red in the legendary Shawshank Redemption, investigates these incredible real-life escapes using cutting-edge technology to recreate them. Join him to discover the untold stories behind these daring jailbreaks, through firsthand accounts from prisoners, their cellmates, families and prison employees.

It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: The Academy Award-winning actor explores the stories of some of the most famous jailbreaks in history, from notorious places like Alcatraz, Dannemora and Pittsburgh State Penitentiary. Freeman, who once played the character of prisoner Red in the legendary Shawshank Redemption, investigates these incredible real-life escapes using cutting-edge technology to recreate them. Join him to discover the untold stories behind these daring jailbreaks, through firsthand accounts from prisoners, their cellmates, families and prison employees.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Reality series following the adventures of Egyptologist Dr Zahi Hawass and his team as they search for the secrets of ancient Egypt. Travelling across this fascinating country, Dr Zahi Hawass and his crew embark on a historical and archaeological expedition – and try to preserve important artefacts.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: The Romans, with the greatest army in the world, are annihilated by Germanic tribes at the Battle of Teutoburg Forest. Go inside the culture of some of the most famous warriors to explore their weaponry, tactics and, ultimately, their psyche.

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: Documentary series in which YouTube sensation Beau Ouimette, an experienced river detectorist, teams up with presenter Rick Edwards, to search the UKs rivers and waterways in an attempt to find underwater archaeological treasures. The pair wil visit some of the most historically significant sites across Britain, where some iconic events and battles took place. By using state-of-the-art technology, archive maps and contemporaneous accounts from the period, they will find various artefacts under layers of silt and rocks, which they will take to local archaeologists and historians to uncover the stories behind the finds.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: Documentary series exploring the history of Earths greatest man-made structures and creations. Where Did It Come From? reveals the earliest examples of brilliance and ingenuity from past pioneers. From the Roman highway project; a civil engineering feat establishing a network of unprecedented highways, to Egypts iconic structures, this series reveals the incomprehensible ides brought to life by magnificent minds, and in some cases, brutal slavery. Join host Michael Guillen as he dives into this fascinating world of both civil and social engineering, born out of ideas we still use today.

programme.title: Unidentified: Inside Americas UFO Investigation
programme.desc: This documentary series features testimony from Luis Elizondo, former military intelligence official and Special Agent In-Charge at the Pentagons mysterious program, The Advanced Aerospace Threat Identification Program (AATIP). This secretive military department was tasked with researching and investigating Unidentified Aerial Phenomena (UAP) which included numerous video clips, three of which were released to a shocked public in 2017. In this six-part series, Elizondo speaks out about his concerns for national security and the Pentagons lack of response to these potential threats. Episodes include fighter pilots from the USS Nimitz describing their terrifying encounter with a UFO; the lights seen in the sky above a New Jersey turnpike; and a saucer-shaped craft observed over Chicagos OHare airport.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Search for the Lost Giants
programme.desc: Search for the Lost Giants follows two brothers on their quest to find lost giants. According to the Bible there were ancient giants wandering along the Earth. A few years ago some Freemasons found stone structures and corridors underground that indicated a lost civilization. The brothers Bill and Jim Viera are looking for evidence of missing bones from ancient skeletons that are suspected to have clocked in at over seven feet tall.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: The Romans, with the greatest army in the world, are annihilated by Germanic tribes at the Battle of Teutoburg Forest. Go inside the culture of some of the most famous warriors to explore their weaponry, tactics and, ultimately, their psyche.

programme.title: Ross Kemp: Deep Sea Treasure Hunter
programme.desc: Have a look at the history series and its four episodes telling us how Ross Kemp, presenter and journalist, is making his life-long dream come true. He dives down on shipwrecks to uncover hidden stories and recover true treasures and mysterious stories hidden behind. Neil Brock is his personal guide and dive supervisor providing him a special intensive training course. Expert divers Emily Turton and Mallory Haas accompany Ross along his exploration around various parts of the UK.

programme.title: Mankind Decoded
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Mankind Decoded
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Lost History
programme.desc: Host Brad Meltzer and viewers are on the hunt for lost and stolen history, including an historic plaque commemorating Alex Haleys Roots. Plus: an original copy of the Bill of Rights, and a mysterious ring worn by Lee Harvey Oswald.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Decoded
programme.desc: Best-selling author, Brad Meltzer is a political thriller novelist, who has now scoured records of the most revered institutions in America. The likes of the US Supreme Court, the secret service, Wall Street and the presidency have come under Meltzers microscope, as he awakens dormant theories, codes and stories as he uncovers secrets of the organisations. Joined by a top team of investigative researchers, join Meltzer as he decodes some of Americas most perplexing mysteries.

programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: The Curse of Civil War Gold is a non-fiction series about American Civil War history. Michigan native, part time treasure hunter Kevin Dykstra and his team search for lost treasures of Civil War Gold, estimated to be worth millions of dollars. They join forces with Marty Lagina from The Curse of Oak Island trying to solve the mystery and find the lost gold. The story goes that Union soldiers tracked down Confederate president Jefferson Davis in 1865 and confiscated his gold. Later it was smuggled north and ended up in Lake Michigan. And this is exactly where Kevin and his crew head to.

programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: In Search Of Aliens is an American TV series following Giorgio Tsoukalos, a writer, ufologist, television presenter and producer. He is a proponent of the pseudoarchaeological theory that ancient alien astronauts interacted with ancient humans. He takes the viewers on a paranormal journey, suggesting that aliens made contact with primitive humans long time ago and there is such evidence as Indian Sanskrit texts, describing flying machines called Vimanas; Jewish Zohar writings describing a "manna machine" similar to chlorella algae processing of today and many more. He explores the fascinating evidence behind the Earths most famous mysteries.

programme.title: Countdown To Apocalypse
programme.desc: An ancient civilisation revered by scientists for their extremely accurate calendars, the Maya are also known for their mysterious ability to predict unsettling events.

programme.title: The Hunt for Baltic Gold
programme.desc: Amber has been coveted in Poland since the 15th century, when handmade jewellery incorporating this semi-precious stone (even though it is not a stone) was sought after by members of the Royal, Imperial, Papal and Ottoman Courts. With 70% of the worlds amber being produced in Poland, the industry is still thriving, especially in the coastal areas around the port city of Gdansk. The viewer will learn about the journey of amber, from its origins as fossilized tree resin to its extraction from the ground and its transfromation into creative and beautiful decorations. The show also tells the story of the people who work in the industry and the difficulties they face in harvesting the amber, getting it to market and selling it.

programme.title: Lost Gold of WW2
programme.desc: Its said to be the greatest lost treasure from World War II and, in this documentary series, a team of engineers, scientists and investigators attempt to finally locate the loot of General Tomoyuki Yamashita. As the war was drawing to a close, General Yamashita is rumoured to have buried a stolen loot made up of worth hundreds of billions of dollars in Southeast Asia. With the world in a state of disarray and confusion, the loot has been left to sink into the shadows, until now. The team hope to unearth its location using groundbreaking technology, studying three different locations in the Philippines that could hold valuable answers.

programme.title: Ancient Top
programme.desc: Ancient Top 10 presents the most fascinating inventions, creations, events and historical figures of the ancient world. Take a journey back in time and discover some of the most amazing facts about ancient civilizations in this entertaining countdown television series, to find out things you never knew about Greeks, Egyptians, Romans and more. Combining CGI and archival footage, the show ranks different things in every episode, from greatest monuments and ships and cities and dictators and much more.

programme.title: UFO Files
programme.desc: In the search for life beyond our planet, this documentary investigates areas on earth that are said to have had UFO activity, conspiracy theories and phenomenons. Interviewing a variety of scientists and experts on UFOs and examining when possible evidence can prove or suggest anything towards super natural life. From going off of tales that have been told and spread through generations and or cultures to personal experiences where sighting have occurred the series covers the super natural phenomenon that is life beyond earth.

programme.title: Missing in Alaska
programme.desc: "Missing in Alaska" investigates the region of northwest Alaska, where over 20,000 people have vanished in an area locals call the Alaska Triangle. In all these cases, the bodies are rarely discovered. Who or whats behind these cases is unknown.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: Following the release of declassified FBI documents pertaining to the death of Adolf Hitler, a team of world-renowned investigators ask the question of whether he really killed himself in a bunker in Berlin. The report states that "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Using modern technology and updated investigation techniques, they will try to define what actually happened to the man who plunged the world into war in 1939. Their investigation will lead them towards a mysterious bunker in Argentina, a missing U-Boat and a potential safe house. Historical documentary series narrated by Dave Hoffman.

programme.title: Engineering Disasters
programme.desc: A modern jetliner crashes with 228 people on board. An oil refinery erupts in Utah, sending shockwaves through town and damaging over 100 homes. Manhole covers explode around the country, killing people and destroying property.

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Gripping and unsettling documentary series that features a team of experts who in each episode examine various footage from news and home video, as well as eyewitness testimony, in order to explain, understand and inform viewers of what actually happened during some of the most devastating natural disasters- including Hurricane Katrina, the earthquake and tsunami that devastated Japan, a monstrous earthquake in Haiti, avalanche of rocks and debris that destroyed a village in Honduras, and many other hurricanes, earthquakes, tsunamis, floodings, droughts and devastating forest fires. They will also investigate how these recent disasters compare and contrast with the most historic natural disasters of the past.

programme.title: The Hunt for Baltic Gold
programme.desc: Amber has been coveted in Poland since the 15th century, when handmade jewellery incorporating this semi-precious stone (even though it is not a stone) was sought after by members of the Royal, Imperial, Papal and Ottoman Courts. With 70% of the worlds amber being produced in Poland, the industry is still thriving, especially in the coastal areas around the port city of Gdansk. The viewer will learn about the journey of amber, from its origins as fossilized tree resin to its extraction from the ground and its transfromation into creative and beautiful decorations. The show also tells the story of the people who work in the industry and the difficulties they face in harvesting the amber, getting it to market and selling it.

programme.title: Lost Gold of WW2
programme.desc: Its said to be the greatest lost treasure from World War II and, in this documentary series, a team of engineers, scientists and investigators attempt to finally locate the loot of General Tomoyuki Yamashita. As the war was drawing to a close, General Yamashita is rumoured to have buried a stolen loot made up of worth hundreds of billions of dollars in Southeast Asia. With the world in a state of disarray and confusion, the loot has been left to sink into the shadows, until now. The team hope to unearth its location using groundbreaking technology, studying three different locations in the Philippines that could hold valuable answers.

programme.title: The Dead Files
programme.desc: The American paranormal television series focuses on investigations by retired homicide detective Steve DiSchiavi and psychic communicator Amy Allan. The two never communicate during investigation, they study the cases of crimes separately, and only coming to certain conclusions compare their results. Their methods of work are completely opposite: Steve uses common sense, documents, talks to real people, and Amy relies on her sixth sense and her ability to communicate with ghosts and spirits.

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: Created by Ghost Adventures Zak Bagans, star of the popular US paranormal show, Help My House Is Haunted is a ghost-hunting series where paranormal investigators search for paranormal entities. Some familiar faces like Barri Ghai, founder of The Ghostfinder Paranormal Society and and the shows investigator and paranormal tech expert, as well as world renowned psychic Chris Fleming join Jayne Harris, Paranormal Researcher. They travel the UK and visit houses and petrified families troubled by hauntings, and using the latest technology try to capture never before seen proof of the paranormal.

programme.title: Ghost Bait
programme.desc: Enter the paranormal world of Bob Magill and Tina Storer, two pioneering investigators who delve into mysterious hauntings and happenings across the United States. Both Bob and Tina experienced ordeals with ghosts at a young age, and used these frightening encounters to learn how to overcome their paranormal fears. In this reality series they help frightened citizens do the same. Following Bobs unique methods, they conduct investigations in homes where residents are adamant they are haunted. They use their findings to heighten their clients sense of fear, in turn drawing out the entities that prey on anxiety. Bob And Tina show their clients that the only way to tackle these forces is to embrace their fears.

They are in charge of TAPS- The Atlantic Paranormal Society- a group of ordinary people interested in getting to the bottom of otherworldly disturbances. Together with their team Jason and Grant research supposed paranormal activity, from Mason, Ohios Kings Island amusement park to the Philadelphia Zoo. Revenge, deceit, and lies are the theme of these investigations, as killers lurk in the shadows; the devils among us.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain
programme.desc: Going through customs can be a stressful experience for most people, even more so if youre attempting to smuggle drugs or weapons into the country. Follow the efforts of the Security and Customs Services at the border of Spain, as they work hard to keep their country safe from criminals. Whether its drugs, weapons or even terrorism, theres a lot of things security have to consider in order to make sure all threats are handled properly. These security forces are always hot on the trail of suspicious activity, in the air, on land or away at sea.

programme.title: Reasonable Doubt
programme.desc: As we all know, the initial verdict in a trial is not always the final outcome as many trial jury decisions are often overturned on appeal. However, the appeals process can take a significant amount of time to go through the system and also incur enormous costs on the individuals involved. This show follows the work of two investigators who re-examine the verdicts in contentious murder cases and assess the prospects of a successful appeal for the families of the people convicted of the crimes to determine if they should appeal or accept the verdict. Each episode traces the developments in the case, whether it be new evidence or witness testimony, which can then shed light on the innocence of the convicted person or show that, indeed, they are guilty of the crime and the verdict was correct.

programme.title: Who the Hell...
programme.desc: Shocking revelations ensue in this deceptive documentary series, where marital relationships built on lies are examined, revealing cases of betrayal, bemusement, and sheer audacity. Featuring dramatised reconstructions and interviews with the spouses involved, each episode tells a story about a particular relationship that has fallen apart after an outrageous discovery. These husbands and wives thought they were marrying their soulmates, but after noticing something peculiar about their better half, they decided to investigate further, revealing cases of double-lives, criminal activity, even sinister killings.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here: The Killer Speaks
programme.desc: Lisa narrowly escapes the clutches of her boyfriend, Corey, who turns into a cold-blooded killer. Now, Corey answers her questions from inside prison.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here: The Killer Speaks
programme.desc: Jenn grew up with a violent big brother, Jimmy, who preyed on his own family. She wants her incarcerated sibling to admit that he killed their mother.

programme.title: The Killer Beside Me
programme.desc: A true-life crime show with a unique perspective, this show uncovers the menacing underbelly of workplace relationships. These true stories lay bare the dangers when office romances or management power struggles get out of hand and result in ghastly murders being committed. The series uses dramatic re-enactments of the incidents along with archive media clips, interviews with familiy and freinds those involved, CCTV footage and crime scene photographs to bring the events to life. The stories themselves are gripping and alarming, such as when a cleaner witnesses the buidlign owners murder or when an employee discovers a hidden camera in the ladies restroom, reports it to the authorities but is then found stabbed to death.

programme.title: The Last Party: Death on Tresco
programme.desc: Josh Clayton lands his dream job on a private island. But after a wild party, the island descends into panic after Josh disappears.

programme.title: The Last Party: Death on Tresco
programme.desc: As the search continues, tensions flare between the police and the family. Another island worker makes a shocking revelation about Joshs last hours.

programme.title: The Last Party: Death on Tresco
programme.desc: Two years after Josh is found, a new twist in the familys search for the truth emerges. Tracey takes the investigation into her own hands.

programme.title: День выборов
programme.desc: Всё начинается с того, что директору московской радиостанции "Как бы радио" Михаилу Натановичу звонит олигарх Эммануил Гедеонович и приказывает немедленно отправить сотрудников в одну из областей Среднего Поволжья для проведения избирательной кампании "технического" кандидата Игоря Владимировича Цаплина. Герои попадают под прессинг действующего губернатора. Они сталкиваются с местными бандитами, милицией, казаками и военными, лояльными действующей власти. При этом, все приключения сопровождаются массой комических ситуаций.

programme.title: Балтия неделя
programme.desc: Житель Таллинна Владимир Гоман с детства увлекался изучением космоса. В эстонской провинции он купил старую водонапорную башню и превратил ее вместе с друзьями в Народную обсерваторию. Ведь в ее создании принимали участие полторы тысячи эстонских волонтеров.

programme.title: Екатерина. Взлёт
programme.desc: Екатерина Алексеевна царствует уже шестой год. Ей приходится бороться с угрозой войны, в то время как при дворе против нее зреет заговор. С государственными заботами тесно переплелись любовные интриги: за сердце Екатерины сражаются Григорий Орлов, отец ее незаконнорожденного сына, и молодой офицер Григорий Потемкин. Но Екатерина Вторая не стала бы Великой, если бы не нашла в себе силы преодолеть любые испытания…

programme.title: Екатерина. Взлёт
programme.desc: Екатерина Алексеевна царствует уже шестой год. Ей приходится бороться с угрозой войны, в то время как при дворе против нее зреет заговор.
